synopsis.text: The stage is set in the post-Pacific War era of 1947, in the heart of Shinjuku, where the locals are grappling with financial hardships. Amidst the struggle, a young man named Tetsuya finds solace in Mahjong parlors, where his exceptional skills in the Chinese board game allow him to outshine his opponents. However, his journey takes a dramatic turn when he encounters the formidable Boushu-san, a seasoned Mahjong player whose expertise far surpasses Tetsuya's. Under Boushu-san's mentorship, Tetsuya embarks on a transformative journey, learning the intricate secrets of Mahjong and eventually earning the prestigious title of Saint Jong. As Tetsuya's skills and reputation grow, the question remains: Can he rise to become the ultimate Mahjong legend?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
